textTemplates.name: bodyEmailAM
textTemplates.text:
Hi Team!

The revisions for client {!$Record.Account__r.Name} for service {!$Record.Service__r.Name} are complete please review. 

Link "https://luxurypresence.lightning.force.com/{!$Record.Id}"

textTemplates.name: bodynotificationIM
textTemplates.text: Dear IM, The revision {!$Record.Name} for client {!$Record.Account__c} has been completed. Please score the revisions antes del link de la revision Link:"https://luxurypresence.lightning.force.com/{!$Record.Id}"
